resources.string: You must set up a microcontroller NodeMCU ESP8266-12E with Ultrasonic Sensor HC-SR04 coded in Arduino for the client page to work properly with your account. The code for the Arduino has already been provided.

This application was developed natively in Kotlin as part of the graduation project "Smart Water Level Detecting System" for the College of Computer and Information Sciences in the Al-Imam Muhammad Ibn Saud Islamic University.

Developers: 
 Mohammed Almekhlafi 
 Sattam Alhamidy 
 Abdulrahman Albalood
Your tank is running low on water!
